tva:BasicDescription.tva:Title: Millionaires park supercars in their LIVING ROOM
tva:BasicDescription.tva:Synopsis: Supercar owners living in an exclusive high-rise apartment block can now park their beloved motors from their - LIVING ROOMS. Hamilton Parks in Singapore is a brand-new 30-storey development where flats cost between £6 and £15 MILLION. But with parking in the city limited, the skyscraper designer came up with an innovative way of parking some of the planets fastest cars. Residents simply drive their 200mph motors into a biometrically-controlled lift at the base of Hamilton Parks on the city's swanky Orchard Road.

tva:Genre.tva:Name: Non-linear audio-video
tva:Genre.tva:Definition: Services where the interaction is based mostly around choosing alternate audio or video files - VOD and AOD, maybe combined with 2.1.1.15 (multi stream)

tva:HowRelated.tva:Name: Recommendation
tva:HowRelated.tva:Definition: The reference points to a resource recommended the provider of the current resource. The service provider considers there to be similarities between the currently described resource and the referenced resource. Example: This could provide access to previous or next episodes or to all episodes (the parent series as a whole). Suggestion to record a programme which the broadcaster recommends because of what the user is watching.It could also point to a Web site proposing related programmes ‘recommended’ by the service provider. A recommendation can be used to suggest content or services or services bundles with a similar subject.

tva:Review.tva:FreeTextReview: Shut﻿ up you annoying twat

Hmmm let me think.. lets say we have a guy who have $1 billion, paying millions in taxes, starting/running companies that employs thousands - and we have a guy who is living on the streets... which of the two guys contribute the most to society? which of the two can help the most? - Bill and Warren﻿ donated 30 billion to their charity foundation, how much did you donate mr. 65moonwalk?

well Mr mudgaard﻿ I have personally donated a left eye in a roadside I.E.D explosion in Kandahar province in June 2005 as far as being a derelict or a bum or a hobo or poor I am none of those things I fought in a war which was initiated to protect the pursuit of life liberty and freedom which indirectly allows my friend driving the lambo and living in a lavish apartment the freedom to do so.Because know this mr mudgaard without a means to defend wealth it will be taken from you.
We kept our cars in front of living rooms since our great grandfather times﻿ if we don't have a garage. LOL
في السعوديه المواطن﻿ موعود بالسكن مع سيارته
haiz.... how come need to wait car at﻿ bottom? direct go inside the car when in the room is it much more better?
遅刻するっっ!!ってときにはまどろっこしいな・・ セレブには縁のない話かww﻿
i like it﻿ when rich people uses their money is some wonderful shit , thanks for the inspiration
What multiple cars wanted to come down or up? It gonna take a﻿ while.
آه بس حنا﻿ نوقف سياراتنا بالقوايل تهي تهي تهي
im never going to afford one﻿ but im not hating
More money than brains? How﻿ do you think they got that money, dumbass..

Idea is awesome but this model could be basically be applied to a really big house, or a small building. And it could be improved so you go up inside the car, instead of﻿ doing the extra process. Still really neat. But sucks.
I﻿ can park my car in my living room also. I live in a garage.
I can do this too but i need the glass, and﻿ better car, and I don't need elevator and those buttons. This is inovative but this is useless bullshit. realy funny lol
What happens when﻿ the car elevator breaks? and yes, ALL elevators do break eventually
Wooow﻿
激しく同意ですｗ﻿
Honey!... Yeah?﻿ I forgot my purse in the car.. Could you get it for me?
So stupid！！！﻿

I have no problem with rich people, hell I'm rich myself, but what is the point of this? What is it good for? In these buildings the car﻿ is safe in the garage anyway, so it's not security. It's just taking up valuable living space and blocking magnificent views. If you've ever been to Singapore you'd know space is scarce. I just don't get it..
Photoshop LoooooL﻿

Reviewer.Job: paha... im 17, male and have long hair... UNEMPLOYED!
Reviewer.Movies: Bladerunner, The Room, 2001 a space oddesy and Red Dwarf.
Reviewer.Music: Playing Scottish Music listening to Hard Rock music =)

Reviewer.School: B.A. Economics B.S.c Financial engineering - London School Of Economics M.B.A - Harvard Business School C.P.A (Israel, USA)
